text: won a kolon mixi yo mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin nabatude, a fa lu a mu tantan na xa a findi tinxintɔɛ ra. A findima tinxintɔɛ ra a to danxaniyaxi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma. Na kui, won bara danxaniya Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ma, alako won xa tinxin na danxaniya saabui ra. Won mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin natinmɛde, han won xa findi tinxintɔɛe ra. Mixi yo mu nɔma Ala xa sɛriyɛ birin natinmɛde, han a fa findi tinxintɔɛ ra.
